# NSSpeechSynthesizer.Boundary.wordBoundary

**Case**

Speech should be paused or stopped at the end of the word.

## Declaration

```swift
case wordBoundary
```

## Constants

- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.Boundary.immediateBoundary**: Speech should be paused or stopped immediately.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.Boundary.sentenceBoundary**: Speech should be paused or stopped at the end of the sentence.
